task.en: Please help me modify the settings so that I can view a larger version of text when I am typing.
task.zh: 请帮我修改设置，从而在输入时，能在单独窗口中显示键入内容的放大版本。
task.ar: أرجو مساعدتي في تعديل الإعدادات بحيث يمكنني مشاهدة نسخة مكبرة من النص أثناء الكتابة في نافذة منفصلة.
task.ja: 入力中にキー入力した内容を単独ウィンドウに拡大表示できるように設定を変更してください。
task.ru: Измените настройки так, чтобы можно было просматривать увеличенную версию текста при вводе.

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Settings" to quit' && defaults delete com.apple.universalaccess hoverTypingEnabled
grading_command: defaults read com.apple.universalaccess hoverTypingEnabled 2>/dev/null | grep -q "1" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Hover Text" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "悬停文本" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "تحويم النص" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "ホバーしたテキストの拡大" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Увеличение текста под указателем" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Accessibility" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "辅助功能" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "تسهيلات الاستخدام" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "アクセシビリティ" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Универсальный доступ" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
